body:
Given that it only affects closed issues, it seems fine to me to freeze
after 1/2 year (or even 3 months). The main reason for a justified comment
added to a closed bug is that something was missed. Those situations are
usually caught reasonably quickly.

Either way, I'm ok with this.
- gri
